Erich Zann's Room.NAME: Erich Zann's Room
DESCRIPTIONS: Opening your eyes, you realize that you are in a dark and cold room, #r@indescribable@ #r@horror@ is churning you ... Looking closely, you notice that in the middle of the room is the corpse of an old man, a violin and Erich Zahn's #p~mysterious~ #p~recordings~ in German.
You pick up the notes, but suddenly feel the #r@scorchingly@ #r@cold@ #r@touch@ of something slippery. You scream in pain!

Madness Out Of The Sea.NAME: Madness Out Of The Sea
DESCRIPTIONS: In the middle of the dungeon, you notice a #r@dreadful@ #r@green@ #r@statuette...@ As you approach it, you hear a #r@frightening@ @whisper...@ #p~«Ph'nglui~ #p~mglw'nafh~ #p~Cthulhu~ #p~R'lyeh~ #p~wgah'nagl~ #p~fhtagn».~ NL NL What will you do?
Pick up the statuette, you hear a @loud roar@ !!! Run!
